name: AirNavigator
labels: GPS naviagation navigator TomTom HSI GPX flightplan route track
short_description: Experimental GPS navigation application for ultralight aircrafts, using as hardware a vehicular and inexpensive TomTom navigator. The program, given a GPX flight plan, is able to provide navigation indications using an HSI along the route up to the final destination.
summary: Aircraft navigator with HSI for TomTom devices
